title: Italian language support
description: We have just added content in Italian. Last year we also added Mandarin, Arabic, Polish, and Ukrainian. Special thanks to all the contributors!

title: Dictionary lookup
description: Clicking on a word in the story now shows its translation. Links to dictionaries are also provided for more details.

title: New Story Editor
description: Use the new editor to create your own stories. Read more about how to collaborate and get the stories published on the website.

title: AI-Powered Explanations
description: Get sentence explanations powered by AI, helping you understand complex grammar. In the stories, click on the question mark next to selected sentences.
Support for microphone (see settings), for you to repeat the sentences out loud
